overview.description: This guide focuses on advanced use cases and customization options in Nomic Atlas, enabling users to tailor the platform to specific workflows and complex datasets.

API integration.description: Leverage the Nomic Atlas API for seamless integration with external tools and workflows.
capabilities: Programmatic access to visualization and analysis tools.
Custom scripts for embedding generation and processing.

example_code.code:
from nomic import AtlasDataset

data = [{'text': 'Example', 'metadata': {'category': 'A'}},
        {'text': 'Another example', 'metadata': {'category': 'B'}}]

dataset = AtlasDataset(name='Custom Project')
dataset.add_data(data)
dataset.generate_embeddings(model='custom_model')
dataset.upload(name='Custom Project')
